summary: App UI behavior: keep the “No” button next to the “Yes” button; on each press the “No” button shrinks and after 4 presses it disappears.

existing_features.title: Update the Question page so the “No” button is positioned next to the “Yes” button (in the same flex row/column flow) instead of being absolutely positioned and orbiting/moving around it.
Implement click tracking for the “No” button on the Question page so that each press makes the “No” button smaller, and after 4 presses the “No” button is no longer visible and cannot be clicked.
Remove (or stop using) the moving/orbiting “No” button behavior for the Question page so it no longer relies on the useMovingNoButton hook for layout/interaction.

new_feature_requests.summary: Keep the “No” button next to the “Yes” button; shrink the “No” button after each press and remove it after 4 presses.

projectName: Make the “No” button stay next to “Yes”, shrink per click, and disappear after 4 presses
